Title: Silverlight Showcase Launcher
Description:
A nice way to provide a showcase system with Silverlight technology. It will show the diferent options in a coverflow 3D fashion & launch an URL when clicked.
It also supports automatic mode for the lazy people & unnatended operation.
HomeWiki:
Silverlight Showcase Launcher is a simple & efficient way to display a showcase.

It was made for the TechEd Europe 2010 Silverlight Booth & you can try it out here: http://www.brainsiders.com//TEE2010/SLShowcase/default.html

Credits!
It uses some code from the Bouncing Plane Demo (from Henry Han see: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/henryh/archive/2009/03/20/mix09-the-gratuitous-graphics-demo.aspx )
For the Horizontal Carousel Iâ€™ve used the Flow Layouts Library, see http://slflow.codeplex.com/, from Simon Ferquel.
Also, for the circular animation I have used the smart technique conceived by John Bruin - http://www.johnbruin.net/index.php/category/silverlight/ - Thanks John!

Happy coding
